name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BulkedIn - Accept LinkedIn Invites in Bulk!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to accept LinkedIn invitations in bulk!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BulkedIn lets you accept LinkedIn invitations in bulk, at just the click of a button! 

Step 1: Install BulkedIn and pin it to your Chrome taskbar. 
Step 2: Go to linkedin.com/mynetwork/invitation-manager/
Step 3: Click on the BulkedIn icon. 
Step 4: You're done!
